• Enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program or equivalent experience in Electrical or Computer Engineering.
• Industry experience in semiconductor or memory product engineering (for senior-level roles).
• Coursework in VLSI, semiconductor processes, Python, and C/C++ (required for some roles).
• Assist with circuit simulation, failure analysis, and qualification processes.
• Good communication skills and self-motivation.
• Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
• Conduct detailed DRAM analysis to optimize end-user performance and reliability.
• Familiarity with DRAM architecture and validation workflows.
